basics.name: Sydnee You
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.summary: Work with a child with disabilities and help the child participate in summer fun activities
highlights: Help the child be an engaging member in the summer fun they are participating in
Be a role model to the child and to the other children in the summer fun group
Ring up products, both non-alcohol and alcohol

volunteer.summary: Helped mentor middle and high school students in web development. Aided with ICSpark administrative duties.
highlights: Help middle and high school students complete basic web development projects involving HTML, CSS, and Javascript
Attend weekly administrative meetings to discuss how to improve the ICSpark experience based on student feedback and future plans and curriculum for the organization

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to any undergraduate, full-time student who earns a semester GPA of at least 3.5 and does not receive an I, F, NC, or W for that semester.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to any incoming freshman. $2000 per year for four years scholarship for students seeking a first-time degree.

awards.title: Certificate of Appreciation
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to graduating high school seniors who are going to attend a four-year college or university as full-time students. Students must submit an application and undergo a long interview with a panel of several judges.  Winners receive $5000 while honorable mentions recieve a Certificate of Appreciation and $600

awards.title: Outstanding Student in Intro. to Programming Award
awards.summary: Awarded to the top student(s) in the Introduction to Programming course.

awards.title: Outstanding Student in Physics Award
awards.summary: Awarded to the top student(s) in the high school physics course.
